***Kickstarter-Limited Exclusivity - Deluxe content will not enter regular distribution. However, it will be available in limited supply at conventions, through contests, online at the BGG promo store, and directly from Gamelyn Games.
In Tiny Epic Western, you are the boss! And upon your boss card, you will keep track of your posse and your influence.
You'll be sending your posse members around town to play poker, gain influence, and purchase buildings.
Each location offers compelling options of where to place your posse members. Like using a building there, gaining instant influence, or doubling down for extra influence at the risk of not getting any.  
You will play a poker hand at EACH location you send a posse member to.
Winning will get you the "poker pot" and any extra influence from a "double down" spot. You will need this influence for acquiring buildings later on in the round.
The Sheriff's Office is a unique location offering players the ability to change the value or suit of their poker card. It also offers a way to acquire an extra building each round and even activate your 3rd posse member! 
BEWARE! If you're standing in the way of your opponent, they can send their posse member in for a duel and possibly take your spot!
Fighting doesn't go unnoticed around here, or unrewarded for that matter, it is the wild west after all. The winner of the last duel always takes the wanted card.
After the locations have been resolved, and players have gained influence for their winning poker hands, a buying phase occurs. Players can now use their influence to acquire one building from a location where they have a posse member. Remember, hitting up the Sheriff's Office can get you an extra buy during this phase; that can be a real game changer!
Buildings offer you victory points, access to their abilities, and industry influence. 
At the end of each round, the player who had the best poker hand at the Town Hall advances one of three industries forward in their rank.
At the end of six rounds,or as many bullets as a revolver can hold, the game is over. The industries have now been ranked 1st through 3rd and the majority share holders (players with the most industry influence) will be paid bonus victory points respectively. Players add that to the sum of their victory points gained from acquired buildings, with the wanted player gaining an extra 2, and the player who has the most victory points is the winner!

campaign.story:
Missed the Kickstarter?  Head over to www.battlemindgame.com! Stay tuned for a new Battlemind game (different theme) coming soon! 
NOTE:  The game's name has been changed from "Cyvase" to "Battlemind". This is not associated with George R. R. Martin or HBO in any way whatsoever.  Per Kickstarter, the reward tiers can't be changed and still say "Cyvase" as the game name. 
Onyx army | 300 gsm card stock | 2.25" x 3.15"
Jade army | 300 gsm card stock | 2.25" x 3.15"
Terrain cards | 300 gsm card stock | 2.5" x 3.5"
Game contents: 115 cards (22 character, 92 terrain, and 1 title)
Battlemind is a medieval-themed battle strategy game in which two players, each with 10 character cards, try to capture/kill the other player's King. Inspired by the game from George R. R. Martin's A Song of Ice and Fire fantasy novels (HBO's Game of Thrones is based on this series), Battlemind combines the strategic elements of Chess, Stratego, and Blitzkrieg to create a an easy to learn but hard to master game with infinite replayability. This game is for anyone who loves strategy games - not just fans of the books!
What makes Battlemind special? Instead of being played like a typical card game (dealing/drawing), it is played more like a board game, with players setting up a "board" made of terrain cards and moving character cards across them. 
Like chess, each character card has a certain number of spaces in which it can move. But that's where the similarities end. Each character has a strength value (1-8) which dictates whether it can capture/kill another character as well as certain advantages and disadvantages over other characters. From the lowly Rabble (rabble is like an angry mob) to the powerful Dragon, every unit has a purpose.  How you use them is up to you! 
Finally, each terrain type can benefit or hinder your character. Use terrain to slow your enemy down, protect your fortress, and even hide from Dragons!
Ultimately, how you set up your terrain, arrange your army, and advance your units will determine whether you will be the victor or the vanquished. You'll laugh at your opponent when he places a crucial unit on his front line that you are able to capture easily, but will be crushed when that same placement allows him to capture your dragon on his first move in the next game!
Will you create a defensive stronghold and make your advesary come to you?  Or will you storm the front lines in hopes of catching your opponent off guard? 
It's your decision.  The fate of the Kingdom rests on your shoulders. Fight for honor.  Fight for glory.  But remember: in the game of Battlemind, every move can mean victory or crushing defeat. 
If you're a fan of HBO's Game of Thrones or A Song of Ice and Fire, the series of novels upon which the show is based, you may already know about the chess-like game many of the characters play called cyvasse.  
After reading the books, I became fascinated with this game. I immediately went looking around on the internet for all of the information I could find. I wanted to play cyvasse, but couldn't find a cheap and portable physical version. I'm a maker and really enjoy creating things, so I decided to create a version myself.  
In the novels, George R. R. Martin loosely describes the game pieces and how the game is played, but doesn't go into any detail about the rules. So, I took what I could from the books (The 10 specific characters/ placing terrain) and some rule ideas I had found online and just used my imagination from there. According to Martin, cyvasse was inspired by "a bit of chess, a bit of blitzkrieg, a bit of stratego. Mix well and add imagination." 
The game is completely designed, manufacturers are waiting to produce the cards, and the prototype has been tested. I need a minimum of $2500 to order a first print run of the game and get it to backers. I hope you enjoy and commit to helping me bring it to life!
To create the board upon which the characters are played, each player places 32 terrain cards (20 Grassland, 4 Forest, 4 Mountain, 3 Wetland, 1 Fortress) in a 8 card x 4 card grid, for a total board size of 64 cards.  
Each setup is done in secret, so players must take turns to set up their side and then cover it while the other player does so.
Since every game the "board" is set up differently, no two games are ever the same!  
Terrain setup.
PLAY

Next, each player arranges his 10 character units on his home side as he sees fit, with the King starting on the Fortress.
Home setup.
PLAY

Players then flip for first to act and play commences with players moving their character units across the board in order to capture their opponent's units and eventually capture his King. We have included a "gold" coin (1"x1" solid brass) with a Dragon on one side and a Crown on the other you can use to flip. 
Add $10 to your pledge ($17 for the double game tiers) and we will include a pair of Dragons, 3D printed with black ABS plastice and measuring at 2" wide x 2.5" tall, that you can use to hold a screen between Home sides. We are using a piece of poster board 21" wide x 9" tall. This prevents one player from having to leave the room as the other player sets up, and also creates an additional way to "play" for who strikes first: the FIRST player who successfully sets up their side is the FIRST to act.  Who can strategically set up the fastest?  
Dragons designed by Dutchmogul. Click for source.
The three really awesome things about Battlemind that make it a challenging strategy game and really fun at the same time are:
Character movement/attack patterns
Character advantages/disadvantages
Terrain differences
To give you a leg up on your opponents, you will have access to a digital strategy guide that will help you through strategic setup and play for your terrain and unit cards. 
Each character has certain attributes that govern where it can move and which units it can attack. The Trebuchet, for instance, is a long range weapon and can attack 3 spaces in any direction.  However, it must shoot full range, meaning it can't attack 1 or 2 spaces away. 
In the following setup, the Trebuchet would be able to successfully capture the Heavy Horse, but not the Spearmen.  Additionally, if there was a Dragon roosting on the Mountain, the Trebuchet could capture it, as range weapons can capture Dragons while they roost on Mountains. 
Most characters have special characteristics which create advantages/or disadvantages for them based on other characters or terrain.  Here are some examples:
The Spearmen may not be captured by calvary units (Light Horse/Heavy Horse).  This makes it a great unit to use defensively. 
The Dragon may only be captured by range units (Trebuchet/Catapult/Crossbowmen). 
The Elephant (6) may capture the Trebuchet (8) (Units usually can only capture other units one strength level above them).
Each type of terrain can benefit or hinder the game units. Here are some examples:
Forests slow down calvary units and can hide units from Dragons. Catapults and Trebuchets can't attack from Forests.  
The Fortress protects any unit inside from being captured but is ruined once it's attacked.  
If a units ends its turn on Wetland, it may not move the next turn. 
Place your terrain carefully! It is often the difference between victory and defeat!  In the following setup, the Dragon may not capture, the Catapult, because it is hiding in a Forest.  However, the Catapult also may not attack the Dragon, because it may not attack from Forests!
One of the great things about this deck is you can make the game your own! To assist with that, we included the following EXTRA cards for alternate play:
(2) Red Priestess cards (extra character)
(4) Hill cards (extra terrain)
(24) Grassland cards (extra terrain)

campaign.story:
Kangol And The Bollman Hat Company
You know Kangol, we make the hats with the kangaroo logo on them.  Kangol is the world’s most famous headwear brand and it’s been worn by some of the world’s most famous celebrities like Brad Pitt, Bill Murray, Eminem, Samuel L. Jackson, Gwen Stefani, Kid Rock, Madonna, Miley Cyrus, and others.  
Kangol is a brand that was born in Britain and grew up on the streets of New York and now we’d like your help to bring another icon to the states and move as much as possible of the Kangol 504’s manufacturing stateside with the Bollman Hat Company. 
We’re looking for your help us bring the historic machinery that has been used to make the Kangol 504 and other styles since the start of Kangol to the states and create new American jobs. 
Bollman Hat Company is America's oldest hat maker.
The Bollman Hat Company is the oldest hat maker in America dating back to 1868. We are employee-owned and pay our employee-owners a living wage. In 2001, Bollman Hat Company acquired the global license to design, produce, and distribute Kangol headwear. By the time Bollman Hat Company had acquired the license, the decision had already been made by the previous ownership to move all the manufacturing to a factory in China which was created in the mid-1990s to stay competitive. The factory in China was purchased in 2006 by a Chinese hat maker who has now decided to exit due to rising labor costs in Southern China. Since acquiring the Kangol license, Bollman Hat Company made several Kangol straw, wool felt, and fur felt styles in their factory in Pennsylvania, but until now, did not make knitted and blocked hats which are the most iconic Kangol styles. 
The 1932 staff of Bollman Hat Company.
About The Kangol® 504
The Wool 504 is the iconic, original Kangol® Cap. First introduced in 1954, the 504 cap gets its name from the block number that it is made on. The 100% seamless wool cap is the ultimate cap for comfort and style and now for the first time ever Made In The USA.
Why Do We Need These Machines?
Over the years there has been attempts to duplicate the machines unsuccessfully.  As our Design Director, Nic Harris, likes to point out this is very similar to the denim selvage machines that jean manufacturers replaced in the 80's.  The result was less of a quality product than what was produced with the older, slower machines.  We're not interested in faster machines that make an inferior product.  We want to keep the quality that has built Kangol and that our customers love.  
The manufacturing of the 504 requires special machinery which was built specifically for Kangol in the 1930’s and 40’s to create the knit of the 504. These are the same machines we are looking for your help to move today. These special machines were each customized to knit, link, tease, shear, and block the Kangol 504 style. Other styles will follow with sufficient funding. 
One of the ten machines already brought to the US.
We have already moved 10 of the machines over to the U.S. and made the necessary electrical conversions for the equipment to work in the U.S., but there are another 70 machines yet to move. Altogether, the cost to move it will be over $650,000. Bollman Hat Company has invested more than $350,000 and in addition we’ve already secured $60,000 from the Department of Community & Economic Development’s Pennsylvania First Program grant, $82,000 in Job Creation Tax Credits, and $18,450 in Workforce and Economic Development Network of Pennsylvania helping to fund the skills training needed for our employee owners. The cost of making the Kangol product in the U.S. is estimated to be more than twice the cost of making it in China, but we eliminate the transportation costs to North America, achieve faster customer turnaround, and control our innovation. 
Why Do We Want To Bring These Machines To America?
America became a world leader because of its manufacturing strength and the middle class built by this strength. Over the past 50 years America has lost its title of the world manufacturing leader with many of the jobs going overseas to China, India, and Bangladesh. That doesn’t mean that great products can’t or shouldn’t be made here and Bollman Hat Company is a testament to that. Aside from being America’s oldest hat maker and nearly 150 years old, Bollman Hat Company is also the founding member of American Made Matters, a community of US Makers with a focus on bringing attention to the importance of making and buying American products. Bollman Hat Company and American Made Matters believe that if it can be made here, it should be made here! The beloved Kangol 504 is the next piece in that puzzle.
PLAY

Bringing the 504 and other Kangol styles' production to America will create dozens of new jobs for American workers while maintaining the current workforce and that can make a big impact.
A Rewarding Campaign.
We've worked hard to come up with some great rewards for backers so not only do you get to feel good about where your money is going but you'll be able to show off your support too.  We've also created bundles so you can get almost any combination of rewards you'd like.
Some of our rewards include:
We’d like your help in strengthening America again and bringing jobs back to the U.S. Your help will be greatly appreciated and reinforce the tide of change to bring back Made In The U.S.A.
Special thanks go to our friends Samuel L. Jackson, West Field Films and Killer Interactive for their help with this campaign.  
And to you, our backers and supporters!  Thank you again!

Somethings can't be unseen and somethings can't be unread...
The Book of Rah is a collection of dark comedy stories, quotes that are straight to hell and words of no wisdom from two eccentric friends who live for self indulgence.
Ace and Monty explain their views on life, the secrets behind a successful relationship, what to do if you wake up with three penguins in your bedroom, the do's and don'ts of buying coke in Mexico, how to take the perfect selfie while running from a bear, how to get fired from your job, why you should dress up as a nudist on strike for Halloween, how to win and lose $10,000 in 24hrs on illegal gambling, among many other adventurous experiences.
Book dimensions: 9' x 6' and 120 to 150 pages.
Here are some excerpts from the book to get an idea how it is:
Ace on losing his virginity: It was messier than I’d like to remember...pretty sure I cried just as much as she did...
Monty on a funeral he attended: My old friend Igloo The Lizard died when a hay bale rolled over the road and crushed his car. He used to bring weed brownies to class and treat the teachers, not a single student failed the classes he took.
Ace on family relations: This family gathering is going to be sick! I'm gonna drink my grandfather under the table and leave him there, like he did to me...when I was ten...at an IHOP...Retribution bitches!
Monty being sexually frustrated: All I wanted was to relive New Year's eve; the cheery cake flavored vodka and that cougar that molested me. Now I'm just gonna masturbate myself to sleep using my tears later.
Ace on gambling: Trust me mate, I'm the Merlin of Odds, the Gandalf of Gambling, I've lost so many times that it can't happen again.
Monty on a Russian Dance Team: Dude, I saw that! The girl in green was gettin' it. She'd probably break your dick off tho...but who can't live with a little broken dick?
Why Should you support our Kickstarter?
Cost - Our goal is to get the book into your hands at a very cheap price. We have tried to create most of the design, cover art and printing material ourselves, but apparently we are not professionals.
So swallowing our pride we are now facing the cost of printing on actual paper and not toilet rolls. We have design cost, cover art, page layout, binding, proof cost, ISBN cost, there's shipping supplies, envelopes, padding, labels, administrative and distribution cost...which are among many other fancy words we thought we could just plagiarize from other projects. Turns out we also have to pay for all of this. I know, such bullshit right!?
Awesome Perks/Rewards - We believe that even if you pledge a small amount you should still get something awesome. We got a wide range of different rewards. Maybe you want us to whisper your name in the ear of a baby sloth the next time we kidnap one from the zoo,  maybe you just want the book with a personalized drunk note, or maybe you want Ace to fly out and party with you at a foam rave. We got all that and much more. Check out all the classic rewards in the column to the right.
Lifestyle Choice - Everyone has their own unique sense of humor and ours is pretty weird but we believe it's a big part of who we are so we embrace it...maybe too much. But if you believe that you can resonate with such a humor we think it's a reason to support us.
Coffee Table Book - This book obviously falls under the category of comedy but it's also a prime example of a coffee table book, and you can never have enough of those.
Coaster - Read the sentence above but replace "coffee table book" with Coaster.
It's a Weapon - Read the sentence about Coffee Table Book but replace "coffee table book" with weapon. Because you never know when you'll need to throw a pointy corner into someone's eye. Support our project and support your right to self defense.
Firewood - At the very least this book can keep you a little warm during the winter time.
Kicking it Forward - We will kick life into a bunch of awesome projects with your help: http://kickingitforward.org
Other Great Reasons:
Because this book is like getting an A on a test that you didn't even study for.
This book is like playing a sport for the first time and realizing you're awesome at it.
This book is like drinking yourself into oblivion and waking up without an hangover.
Because last week you spent $15 on Starbucks coffee and lifestyle magazines alone.
Because $15 wouldn't even cover the four drinks you got peer pressured into buying at that place you didn't even want to go to but your friends dragged you along. They all wanted different fu**ing drinks making the order super complicated and leaving the bartender angry at you. Next thing you know all your friends have magically disappeared like innocence at a strip club. Nobody bought you back drinks. The music sucks and is giving you permanent ear damage. You start reevaluating your life-choices and before you know it you're spending another $12 on ice cream and streaming Netflix. I promise that this book is gonna beat that all day...not that it has ever happened to me...I'm not speaking from personal experience.
Signed to the Sun(Hot!), Banging Solar Systems and Getting Space Money
Here you can get a taste of the different songs you can choose to get as a reward for pledging. If you think you could record some amazing lyrics or if you know anyone who could sing some magic on these tracks, please let me know!
Shipping Information and Delivery Date
UNITED STATES - Shipping is FREE within the United States.
THE REST OF THE WORLD - As you can assume, if you didn't jump out of school during 4th grade, the further you live from the US the more expensive the shipping. After looking around at the various shipping costs worldwide we've realized that if you pick a reward with only the book you're shipping shouldn't cost more than $60.
DELIVERY DATE - We are looking at shipping the book 3-4 months after the kickstarter ends, if a part of the process takes longer time we will let you know but it will most likely move along fine or faster than expected. HOWEVER anyone who pledges for the book will get a digital copy earlier if they want to.
All the best,
Ace

Risks and challenges
There are many challenges in starting a fashion brand. But the biggest one has to be quantities. They make or break the fashion business, especially for small brand. Factories will turn their back on you the moment they hear that you can't meet their minimums. Which are usually the high hundreds or thousands if you want to get decent profit margins. We have created a game app, for Android and Apple, that basically boosts all the features of the strategic styles of games like Clash of Clans, Dominations and Clash of Lords and we have taken out all the unnecessary elements that ruined the flow of those games.
A video game should always provide something fresh and unique to those who play it. We truly worked hard to come up with the most essential elements of the games that have become huge hits all over the world, but we are bringing in very unique and useful elements. For example, the players will be able to level up there troops by using them, not by paying huge amounts of resources and waiting for days to complete.
Think of a supercharged Age of Empires style game that has been upgraded for mobiles. To most people the name Clash of Clans will be more familiar and the addictive elements of this game has all been brought to Age of Stickmen.
We have worked very hard to get this entire game concept moving forward with character development, strategy tweaks and revamps that will turn it into an instant hit. We just need your support in order to be able to get the entire process done with as many resources as possible.
Our commitment to this project has been huge and we have invested a lot of time and money into bringing this concept to the level that allows for the development process to be the next logical step.
This game will have enhanced gameplay, replay value, fair level up systems and it will not make you feel like you have wasted your efforts if leveling them up. You will be given a chance to revive units that have reached a certain level and this will make it fair for anyone who invests plenty of time in upgrading.
You will also be able to control your units with the swipe of a finger, which is a very refreshing addition to this game. In pre-battle mode you can organize your troops into smaller groups to be able to control them easier throughout the battle.

Features of the Game:
Era: Roman Empire 
Story line: You have been sent by Caesar to establish a new Roman Settlement for the purpose of helping secure the newly conquered land. This is a wild and dangerous land. You need to make sure you prepare your Settlement to defend off attacks from unfriendly Settlements. You are given the authority to attack anyone you see fit for the glory of the Empire.
Buildings: Everything will be based off the Roman style. Market, Marble Quarries, Iron works, Castra (which can house 150 troops), Academy etc.
Builders: We want the user to start off with two builders. This allows the user to build more than one building at a time, from the start. By having two builders at the beginning it will also let us show the user the new feature.
Builders can be stacked!! Example: If I upgrade my Marble Quarry to level 5, it will take 24 hours to complete with just one builder. I can take a second builder and add him to the project thus diminishing the project by a quarter of the time (from 24 hours to 18 hours). I could then add a 3rd or 4th builder as well.
Resources: The two main resources for now will be Marble and Iron.
Troops: We have a special plan for troops. Troops sent into battle, whether you win, lose, or retreat, will not be lost if they haven’t died. Players will not have to save up and spend resources to upgrade troops. Troops will be upgraded by the experience they gain from battles. They will gain more experience from winning than from losing. Troops can also be upgraded from another vital aspect – the Academy. By placing troops in the Academy, the user is giving them up for “X” amount of time. If a troop is in the Academy they will gain experience 5X faster than a troop who fights in battle. The different units will also change in appearance as they level up.
The troops will of course be Roman style: Legionary – Infantry, Praetorians- Heavy Infantry, Archers, Auxiliary Archers (Archers on horses), Catapults, Rams, Trebuchets, Pikeman etc. Each one will be worth a certain number of troops. Defences/Traps: Archer towers, Trebuchets on walls, Boiling pots of Oil on walls, Massive wooden-spiked bear traps hidden underground, Ballista, Attack Dogs, Walls (Up-gradable from wood poles to Stone Walls) etc.
Player vs. Player: In other mobile strategy games, you can only attack a person when they are offline. In this game, not only will players be able to attack/revenge a person while they are online but the player being attacked can use up to ¼ of his army to defend himself. A player can also place ¼ of his army to defend him while he is offline too.
Card integration: When you attack a village and win you get a random card that can be either defensive or offensive. When attacking, a player can use an offensive card to give him a slight advantage.  A Defender can also use a card when attacked and store a card to be used while offline.
Gems: We are calling them Denarii based off of what the Romans called their coins. We do not want to make the mistake of other developers and build the game around the “gem concept”. This is where a lot of game apps have failed/frustrated their users. Instead, game-play will be the main focus. Rewarding users for playing the game, rather than forcing them to use "Gems" because they feel like they're not getting anywhere.
Morale Meter: In Rome, when the army returned from war, the city was excited and the troop and citizen’s morale was boosted. We want to integrate this into the game. We would like to have a “Morale Meter” located somewhere on the screen. When the Meter is at 0% the Iron and Marble mines are at normal mining rate. When it is at 100% the rate of mining is doubled. Also, when the meter is kept at between 95-100% for a certain period of time, Caesar will send a special gift to the player –Denarii. The way to make the Meter go up is by winning attacks. When you win, it goes up and when you lose to many times in a row, it comes down a little. Also, doing nothing causes the Meter to go down.

Conclusion
We are truly looking forward to bringing this game to the community and we are looking for support from everyone who is a fan of games that foster strategic planning and help exercise the mind.
This is the kind of game that you should support if you love strategy gaming.

campaign.story:
LED flares are the future of emergency roadway safety. LED flares (or e-flares) are becoming the best practice for roadway safety around the globe.
The Care-Flare, a patented, innovative e-flare solution, introduces a new standard to the world of LED flares. The Care-Flare is intuitive to use, highly visible, reliable in even the most extreme conditions and environmentally friendly.
Introducing the Care-Flare
My name is Adam Cotsman and I am the creator of the Care-Flare.
I am a paramedic with over eleven years experience in one of Canada's most progressive Paramedic Services. I have used combustible (or incendiary) flares many times when responding to emergency calls. Whenever I used them, I was always struck by their many shortfalls and how unsafe I felt. As I did more research, I found others who shared my deep unease. 
Numerous studies highlight the combustible flare's many drawbacks. They burn at high temperatures and can ignite fires and injure those who use them (Evaluation of Chemical and Electric Flares). They are challenging to handle, burnout quickly, pollute our air and leave hazardous waste on roads which contaminates our water (Evaluation of Alternative Causes of Widespread, Low Concentration Perchlorate Impacts to Groundwater). 
Concerned, I created a product that introduces a higher level of safety, is environmentally friendly and is simple to use.
Care-Flare is for everyone!
The Care-Flare is essential for EVERYONE who drives. Crashes involving pulled over vehicles are an all too common devastating occurrence. Annually, nearly 350,000 parked or disabled vehicle crashes occur in the U.S. alone, in which an average of 507 people are killed and over 30,000 people are injured (The Impact of Highway Safety Flares on Driver Behavior). Having professional-grade Care-Flares handy could be a life saving decision during emergencies or vehicle failures.
The unique design
The Care-Flare was designed in close consultation with emergency service personnel, industrial designers, electrical engineers, certified Health and Safety Committee members and logistics experts.
As a first responder, my life and the lives of those at an emergency scene depend on the effectiveness of the flares that I am using. I trust Care-Flare with my life.
Care-Flare's unique design reflects its simplicity, durability, reliability and ease of use:
• Two simple settings that are easy to activate: a flashing sequence (seen above) as well as a fixed red light
• Robust structure ensures that it functions even in the most volatile conditions
• Its length (39 cm / 15.35 in) ensures maximum visibility 
• Light output can be seen from 2000+ meters / 6560+ feet 
• On flashing sequence, runs for 70+ hours on four 'C' cell alkaline batteries 
• Functions in extreme cold (-40°C / -40°F) and heat (+40°C / 104°F) 
• Drop resistant and waterproof
• The LED light source of the Care-Flare provides an environmentally conscious alternative to combustible flares. The Care-Flare is CE and RoHS certified
What's next?
For over 2 years, we have secured intellectual property, completed multiple prototypes, built the tooling, completed the first small production order, done vigorous testing and certifications and it is currently being trialed in the field during real life emergencies.
We are launching globally in 2016 but require a large production order to obtain a discounted rate with our manufacturer. The larger the order, the larger the discount. 

To thank those who support the Care-Flare campaign, we are offering the following rewards:
Thank you for creating safer roadways for everyone!

The Onix - Say goodbye to unruly cables!
Our Simple story ... 
The Onix like most ideas was the birth child of an everyday problem…We were simply tired of bending over and picking up our cables. Yes, we know there are products similar but they are not the ideal solution. For example the Onix was designed with a 360 degree swivel. The swivel allows for movement such as pulling and pushing. Where other cable management tools fall short, and drop or snag your cables as soon as you pull on them!  
The Onix has many different iterations, it started out in almost a twig like form and was beaten into submission until it satisfied all of our testers (My wife, brother and few friends at work). We thought so much of the little guy, we wanted to share it with you and for a few bucks you can help us launch. 
We are aiming to produce the Onix with Polypropylene plastic that allows it flex repeatedly expanding to different sizes, and hold cables in place with its natural elasticity.  It is durable, functional, and fun! 
Gain control of your cables with the Onix!

But it seems that is not what our minds are trained for" — Author Unknown
The Project
Sabe Lewellyn is a visual artist and designer with a strong advocacy for spreading awareness on global environmental issues. Now, to raise awareness on the state and fragility of nature, he takes on a one-man expedition in the Gulf of Mexico, which he calls Exileration.
“I am going on a one-man expedition to create art and draw awareness to the fragility our natural surroundings. I am traveling to the U.S. National seashore in the Gulf of Mexico,” says the artist. He will be going to Horn Island, one of the barrier islands off the coast of Mississippi and Alabama. 
 “One of my goals is increasing the urgency and understanding of the fragile place we put ourselves in by neglecting our impact on the world,” states artist, who will live on the park in the island, in primitive camping conditions and with only the bare necessities.
Lewellyn’s projects and advocacy was inspired by Walter Anderson, an artist and naturalist who also lived in Horn Island for a time to document the life around him through radiant watercolor art. Lewellyn hopes to follow Anderson’s footsteps and continue to document the natural ecosystem in the island.
Through the crowdfunding campaign, Lewellyn aims to raise the funds to cover the costs for the needed camera and equipment to document his trip. Part of the funds will also go to boat prototyping materials and supplies such as food and a tent he himself designed.
According to him, his Exileration project is a three-part piece, which includes planning the trip, exile on Horn Island, and the creation of the film and other work for exhibit. He has chosen Horn Island because the location has been under much stress due to human hazards, such as the BP oil spill and the US Army Mustard Gas contamination.
From 1943 to 1945, Horn Island was closed to public access and activity for use as a biological weapons testing site by the US Army. Later on, asbestos materials were identified around old concrete foundations on the north side of Horn Island, known as The Chimney. Asbestos has shown to be a cancer-causing agent. In addition, mustard gas residue has been detected in the sands nearby the US Army testing sites. Mustard gas is a blistering agent that attacks the eyes and respiratory systems. While the military is in the process of destroying any residue, Lewellyn aims to go deeper and investigates on the effects of these military operations to the ecosystem in the area.
In return, backers of the campaign will receive copies of his artwork through wallpapers, postcards, and signed prints. Backers will also receive printed and electronic invitations to every gallery and museum show exhibiting Exileration. Higher tier backers will receive a digital copy of the documentary film, be included in the film credits, and many more.
About Sabe Lewellyn
Sabe has been an artist and designer for over 12 years. Exileration is the second of two projects that he has undergone to help educate people and involve them in environmental issues. His experience includes participation in the Particles on the Wall exhibit at University of Washington. Soon a book will be released that includes his contribution to that project. This was an interdisciplinary exhibit exploring the elements of the nuclear age, Hanford history, and its impacts on humans and the environment.

Long ago... a galaxy was destroyed and desperately needed to be restored. A chosen few were selected to help restore the stars! In Astrum Resurrectione you have the task of rebuilding that galaxy. Are you up to the challenge?

*** All Cards will be Beautifully Rendered - Poker Sized ***
Build your own solar system in this fast paced, space game for 2-7 players. During the game players race to connect planet and star cards together to form a unique, expansive, solar system scene. Final victory is secured in the end by the player with the most galaxy points.
 By connecting planet and star cards, a player can harness the power of celestial bodies providing them unique advantages over other players: faster draws, extra plays, trade access, card destruction, and much more!
Gameplay Video Review: Eric Howell
 Gameplay Part 1: (Feat: Ellie Belle)
PLAY

 Gameplay Part 2: (Feat: The Completed Star)
PLAY

Quick Rules:
Set Up: Shuffle both decks. All players start the game with 5 galaxy cards from the large main deck and 3 mission cards from the mission deck.
Missions: Mission cards are kept hidden from other players until the end of the game and serve as objectives for players to try to complete during the game- example "build 2 dwarf planets." Be careful though, if a mission isn't completed by the end of the game then it subtracts instead of adds from your total victory (galaxy) points.
Turns and Galaxy Deck: The galaxy card deck is shared by all players and set in the center of them. Each turn a player draws 1 galaxy card and can play 1 galaxy card to build their solar system scene. The 1st card played by each player starts that players scene but all additional cards must be played only in allowed ways shown on the top left of the cards by the placement key.
Bonus Actions: All galaxy deck cards have a bonus action that comes into play once the card is placed into a player's scene. Some actions include (draw 1, play +1, trade 2, etc.). Most actions are shown on the top left of each galaxy card directly under the placement key and those only happen only 1 time when the card is played. If the action appears in the top right of the card, then it is a celestial event and the action can be used every turn.
End of Game and Galaxy (Victory) Points: Once the galaxy deck runs out, all players get one last turn to play cards to their scene and complete remaining missions. Afterwards the game ends and players total up their galaxy points which can be found at the top right of all played galaxy cards. Players then reveal and score or subtract from any failed or completed missions. In the end, everyone has created an awesome space scene and the player with the most galaxy points wins!

Our goal
We want to make the world smarter and make training/learning easier to access and less expensive for everyone! If you want to learn a language, improve your computer skills, or have any type of training, we can make the process simple and affordable for you!
How do we do this?
1. We will provide a very user-friendly web portal (and make sure the whole world hears about it).
2. If you want some type of training, you can place a request (for free) as a 'trainee'.
3. Trainers make an offer (price and location, although some training can also be done via Skype).
4. The trainee selects the preferred offer.
Learning via Skype
How does this help you as a trainer/teacher?
We will not ask you for high commissions, just a small fee to help us to break even. Thanks to modern technologies, you now have the entire world as a potential customer base. If you perform well, you will be ranked higher and chosen even more often! 
How does this help you as a trainee? 
As a trainee, you can select from trainers/teachers all over the world and we will not charge you anything for use of this convenient service. You will then get offers from various trainers; based on the ranking and the price of the trainer, you can make your selection. After the training is complete, you can provide feedback that will impact the ranking of the trainer. 
Any kind of training can be provided
Where does the money go to?
Breakdown of costs
Timeline
Who are we?  
We are two friends living with our own families far away from each other but with Skype we can communicate often. During one of our talks we came up with the idea for the project. We learnt a lot from each other and our goal is that learning in general can be made easier for everybody. Jointly we have more than 30 years of work experience in Finance/IT/Project management/gardening &plumbing :) We love sports like downhill skiing, badminton, mountain hiking and besides that learning new things is something we like very much (work and home related).

campaign.story:
Kinetic Farms is a project designed to teach kids living in America’s food deserts (areas without ready access to quality retail grocery stores) about Aquaponics as an alternative method of food production and also provide fresh vegetables and fruits for those kids impacted. We want to instruct kids on how to grow food in their own communities.
This mobile classroom - that has a vegetable and fruit garden, and a solar powered Aquaponics system in a functioning school bus - teaches the raising of edible aquatic species and the production of edible plants to create a symbiotic relationship in which both plants and animals can be produced in the same close-loop system. Teaching Aquaponics in these foods deserts will spark the interest of children to dream for themselves and become more interested in a healthier lifestyle.
Our goal is to create and provide for ongoing, sustainable food production that will inspire kids to explore and to produce food for their communities.
Kinetic Farms benefits:
Create more opportunity for learning and hands on experience for students.
Fully develop Aquaponics as a necessary, alternative method of food production
Increase production in order to feed more students fresh, local produce.

campaign.story:
Sumatokado - a revolutionary card game that will change your perception on playing cards.
This concept of card games consists of 2 main parts – app for Android or IOS (at this stage) and smart cards. What can you do with them? Excellent question! The answer is…anything!
Let me explain further. Every physical card looks exactly the same as the other. The secret is the unique number which is recognized by our app on every single card, so virtually – they are totally different. How different? It’s up to you!
Sumatokado enables you to create your own card games or even to use our build-in games (even as part as your own games). So, how does it actually work? Another great question!
First of all, you need to install our Sumatokado app, and get some of our smart cards.
Every card is scannable via NFC or QR code, depending on the support of your device. You (the player) have 2 choices – play an existing game or create a new custom game.
In order to play an existing game – choose the game, read its instructions and you are ready to go! For example, we created a mini game called “Leader War”. You shuffle the cards and every player picks a card. Then, using a smartphone or any compatible device, everyone scans their card to revel whether they won or not.
If you want to create a new card game – scan the cards you want to be part of your game (as many cards you as want!), insert a picture and a sentence and choose the purpose of the card.
Theoretically, you will be able to create an endless number of card games, share them and purchase pre-made games. With your support, we will be able to push this project even further!
Hi, it’s Ben – one of the game designers. When I was a child, I loved to collect playing cards (who didn’t?). I loved it so much, that I’ve spent thousands of dollars on almost every playing card packs I have seen on stores.
Now, when I’m 27 years old, I started to miss that feeling of physical gaming cards and their fun and diversity. That is why I decided to create a hybrid card game concept, which combines the need for the devices we use every day, and quality physical gaming cards.
At that moment, I and my friends understood the amazing potential of this card game concept – using a 1 pack of cards for any game we want to play!
We started working on this game, and while the game is not yet finished – you can see here our progress and huge potential of it.
In order to it to succeed, we need the support of each and every one of you! So, please back this project if you think it is the next big thing and in return we will send you the game, so you will be the first to experience the change!
Thank you for your support,
The Sumatokado team!

Ready Rashid is coming to life but only with your help!   
Support the Making of the First Amusingly Thought-Provoking Animated Movie about "ReadyRashid"; and his humorous eye-opening character!  
THE TEAM: 
OutFront Films team is pleased to have this opportunity to present the Ready Rashid Creative Project! This unique cartoon project brings an opportunity for development and global distribution of the first Arab/Expat family values-oriented cartoon. 
Astonishingly, only few creative groups have stepped up to fill this huge gap in creative media business potential so we are asking the help of our awesome supporters and pledging community to donate as much as they can to make Ready Rashid go live on the big screen. 
The Ready Rashid Cast
Ready Rashid:
From concept design in 2012, through first-phase content development in 2013, OutFront Films has positioned the Ready Rashid project to be a unifying, creative force and something everlasting which will serve new generations for years to come.
We crossed oceans of creativity, explored many collaborations with various insiders to bring only the best out of “Ready” and his unique ways.
Since our team is in love with comic art in general; the idea of bringing new age humor that challenges the limits of today’s society with unique concepts and character relations is something that is meaningful in life to us.
Upraised irony, insight into modern family life, Islamic/Western values, new worldly perspectives and so much more are the cornerstones of a cartoon designed to achieve international distribution and deserved acclaim.
Ready and Bobby "The Weatherman"
What is Ready Rashid?
Ready Rashid is a cartoon comic based on an orphaned Arab boy who is adapting to life within the cosmopolitan environment of a modern Middle East city.
Ready's story begins on location in the streets of his battle stricken nation with an international news reporter who was curious about Ready's life story and the tragic loss of his family.
Coincidentally, one of the viewers was a commercial pilot and father of a very stable Arab family.
This father was so overwhelmed by the touching story of the young man’s loss of his original family; that, he and his wife who is also a much respected pediatrician in the community searched for a way to legally embraced Ready into their family.
Supported by new friendships and a stable family, Ready is making his way into a big world with determination and natural guidance.
A world of opportunity unfolds in front of him – new challenges are on the horizon but this time, he has all what matters the most by his side!
Winter in Dubai
About Characters:
The Ready Rashid family characters portray a mix of traditional Arab/Expat values and roles interwoven circumstances that could easily be experienced by families across the world.
This character set provides a unique story-line hook: they portray the close-knit nature of the Arab family through four generations (child, young adult, parent, and grandparent).
While the focus of Ready's family dynamics are both built on a strong foundation of Arab culture and values, the story-lines will always be presented in a lighthearted, welcoming perspective, designed to endear to all cultures and religions.
Impact and Our Mission:  
The Ready Rashid cartoon media offers the potential for placement of the Arabic and English languages side-by-side.
There is yet another hook engaged: the characters are traditional in their Arab Muslim orientation, yet they are placed in circumstances familiar to families around the world. Several languages; several cultures—one cartoon media: Ready Rashid, family and friends!
We believe the Ready Rashid project has a unique opportunity to address cultural and racial barriers— how? Just by not addressing them.
Extended Characters provide the opportunity for story lines that integrate four cultures (Arab, American, British, and Asian) into the setting of young people experiencing life as lifelong friends.
OutFront Films has also developed the Ready Rashid cartoon for immediate adaptation into social media. Along with a Website and Facebook page, a keen area of opportunity is the development of mobile device ‘apps’ featuring Ready and his young friends.
The Website, Facebook page, and Mobile Apps provide a safe and productive online internet space for all children to enjoy!
https://www.facebook.com/readyrashid
https://www.twitter.com/readyrashid1
https://www.instagram.com/readyrashid
Eshika, Bobby, Ready and Max
What We Need & What You Get:  
The OutFront strategy is to align with a major animation production firm as a first step toward development and distribution. This alignment serves two purposes:
- To enable the physical production of animation.
- Access the media firm’s natural connections to visual media outlets.  
To accomplish this first goal, we are seeking funding from the crowd fund community, our long term supporters, friends, family, and fans in the amount of $250,000. This amount will help us take the “Ready Rashid” cartoon media and convert it into a spectacular movie that appeals to both children and their parents. Most important of all, this movie is bypassing or to better express; it goes beyond religion, politics, culture, classes and breaks all barriers emphasizing only one notion: we are all the same!
OutFront Films, LLC
THE TEAM
OutFront Films is the NYC-based LLC that dreamed up and developed the Ready Rashid creative concept and cartoon media. Through solid working relationships with creative talent from around the world (USA, Europe, and Asia); this project has been prepared for development into all forms of cartoon media: Print, Animation, Film, Social Media, Licensing, and Merchandising.

Spirit's Destiny Cover
              "Introduction To My Kickstarter"
Destiny Mitsu Jean a.k.a Spirit
Welcome to the universe of my new comic book series Spirit's Destiny which features an exciting new superhero living in a corrupt society. I will need help printing and getting my book published.My goal is to print copies for those who are interested and make it available on the comic's website.  I would also like to present this comic series to a top publishing company, so they can embark on this new journey with me along with you, my generous backers! 
Spirit will undergo different obstacles in her heroic debut, which will involve martial law, government corruption, terrorism, and personal situations. With your help this mission can be a success, so I hope you are looking forward to this comic like I am!
Destiny Mitsu Jean a.k.a Spirit
                " Story Information"
On the surface, Destiny Mitsu Jean is a typical troublesome 16-year-old teenager who attends Bottom Creek Senior High. She is a lonesome, eccentric, ill-tempered, competitive, compassionate, and sarcastic individual. She is often judged as a disobedient hoodlum by many of the adults and the teachers in her community. She can come across as very anti-social when it comes to the general public.  All of these traits stem from a history of abuse at the hands of a former caregiver.
When Davine, Destiny's mother who was also a Navy Seal Officer, discovered that Destiny had been abused by her caregivers, she attacked the couple, very nearly killing them.  Afterward, Davine decided that Destiny needed to learn to protect herself and began to train her at a very young age.  Since Davine was often deployed or away on assignment, Destiny's grandparents stepped in to care for her.  Her grandfather was a skilled Taekwondo, Aikido, and a Wing Chun Sensei. He took Destiny as his pupil. Destiny's grandmother was secretly a sorceress paid for hire for everything from resurrection to simple love potions.  When she found out about Destiny being abused, she sent a spell to the perpetrators, who finally did meet their demise. She eventually erased Destiny's memories and cast a spell to purify the child's mind, body, and soul.
Destiny is currently a skilled martial artist who has mastered ten different forms.  This accomplishment is not only due to her early and continuous training, but also  because of a serum that was injected into her blood stream as a child.  The serum, which she is unaware of having, enhances both her agility and endurance.  Destiny has a strained relationship with her mother who she sees as forcing her to constantly train for no reason (since she has no memory of the abuse). 
Destiny only socializes with two other teenagers who she grew up with: Rachel Terracina and Erik Wright.  Rachel used to bully Destiny during her elementary school years, but now she is her best friend.  She is a cheerleader at Bottom Creek High and is known to be the jokester and a fun loving daredevil. Erik is the British playboy who has a crush on Destiny, of which she is oblivious.  
In Destiny's world, martial law has been imposed in order to see how it will affect society.

Let's destroy this book!
Hi there, amazing person of Earth, my name is Hung Thai. My pen name is Zen Thai. There's nothing I like more than chilling out and hanging out with my friends and family. My friends enjoy my happy-go-lucky lifestyle and attitude. They wonder how I'm able to keep that child-like energy even as I grow older. For years I've kept it a secret - but no more! 
It's simple - I vent daily. I don't let feelings of anger, hatred, sadness, jealousy, disgust, and whatever else fester inside. I let them go by singing loudly, dancing obnoxiously, and just generally not giving a bleep. I do this so that I could get back to chilling. 
It seems to me that people just aren't letting go of these hurtful and painful feelings often enough- are you one of these people? Maybe you don't know how or maybe you've been taught to deal with these feelings in calmer ways, but sometimes all it takes is to scream at the top of your lungs! 
This is all I hope to do with this book. I want YOU to use it to let go of whatever it is that's bothering you. Don't let crap loiter around! Flush it down the toilet! 
This book contains pages upon pages of satisfying destruction. There is much fun to be had! I can't show you the really fun stuff because well... profanity (don't worry, there's a clean version if you'd like that instead). But here's an example:
It also contains common situations that just piss the sheet out of me. I'm sure you can relate - like this: 
Note: This book contains profanity because you know... real anger involves throwing around such words! I'm sure you can relate. When you pledge, please let me know if you'd like the clean version. :)
But this book isn't just about destruction (most of it is), it's also about celebrating accomplishments and remembering all the wonderful things in life - like this: 
My friend, you deserve to live a stress-free and happy life. Let this book help you!
Rewards
The ultimate reward is feeling awesome after destroying the pages within this book, but there's more!
For the ENRAGED level, your name will be embellished to be awesome as shown below. I will come up with sweet title for you or you can provide me one yourself. This page will be found at the end of the book so you may live on forever! 
For the LIVID FURIOUSITY level (yeah that's not a real word, but that's how angry I can get to create words like that), you get your name embellished with awesomeness AND the insignia of an IMMORTAL like this:
On top of that, I will get with you and give you YOUR OWN PAGE in the book where you can tell your story or pet peeves or whatever it is that make you RAGE! You will be IMMORTALIZED forever! See example below: 
For the EPIC RAGE level, you get everything plus a t-shirt AND a video of me acting a fool! Woot woot, right?
What's the progress of this book?
I'm glad I asked. It's basically done pending how many pledges come in for the LIVID FURIOUSLY pledge, but I will communicate with those pledging at this level quickly to get the book out to you as soon as possible!
LET'S HAVE SOME FUN!
While you're waiting for this campaign to end, let's have some fun! Whatever level you're pledging, I will send you a page you can print out and tear apart. It would be totally awesome if you created a video of it and upload it to whatever service you like (youtube, etc) and I will link it here so we can all enjoy the destruction together. Use your creativity. Let's see what you can come up with to destroy a piece of paper. But whatever you do, please do it safely. 
HAVE FUN!
Don't forget to tag it with #ATTB #aterribleTEARABLEbook.
THANK YOU!
Thank you for visiting, and if you read this whole thing, thank you again! I look forward to hearing from you! 
PLEDGE and help me get this book in YOUR hands - to tear it the bleep apart. Get some for yourself and/or gift them to your friends/family. 
Please share/comment and let all your friends know! Let's make this happen!

campaign.story:
What others say about you is often far more important than what you say about yourself, after all you’re only going to say good things about yourself, but recruiters, landlords and credit agencies want a truthful, professional reference – and quick!
Reference Me Please - for all your reference needs
 If you are applying for a new job, an apartment, or applying for a loan of some kind, theimportance of reference checksis much more significant than many applicants might consider. Depending on what you are applying for, a poor comment or remark from a reference can greatly reflect on the individual, and on their ability to hold a job, or to make payments on a loan.
Reference Me Please
Reference me please the mobile app, allows you to request and store references on your smartphone. Whatever you need a reference for; Reference Me Please will have it.
Simply request a reference from a previous employer, credit agency or landlord and store it on your Smartphone ready for the next request.
References are valuable! They give potential employers an idea of what they’re getting into by hiring you with a glimpse into your work ethic and habits.
Reference Me Please – For Candidates
Make sure you get hired!
As a candidate, whether it is a job you are applying for or a mortgage for a home, references are an indicator as to how you acted in previous situations.
If you put down a former landlord as a reference on an application for a new home or a rental application, you have to make sure they are going to say good things.
From paying the rent on time, to being a quiet individual that did not cause any troubles, these positive remarks are going to greatly impact the potential of you getting the apartment or loan, or possibly losing out on it.
Reference Me Please – for recruiters
The importance of reference checks for employers/lenders
It is important to check references as an employer.
For example, if it is a government position, you have to know the individual applying is not a convicted felon, or doesn’t have a prior record.
If an individual is applying for a mortgage, as a lender, you want to know they make payments on time, have a good credit score, and are a reliable borrower. 
The importance of reference checks is that the references you contact, about different scenarios, can give you a great indication about the person you are interviewing or considering for a loan, and the references can help you determine if they are the best candidate or not.
Reference Me Please Wallet
The Reference Me please app has an added feature – the Reference me Please Wallet. 
A digital safe, allowing you to store all of your important documents including wills, contracts, tenancy agreements, tax forms, birth certificates and social security information.
All of the important documents you need for life, available at the press of a button, so you always have whatever document you need for any situation.
How it works
Reference me Please is a mobile application that stores all of your reference details.
Reference Me Please has six different reference categories:
Personal/Character Reference: Court cases, volunteering
Business Reference: Business loans, Business networking, and professional services.
Employment Reference: Job employment, and Job advancement.
Academic Reference: Private school, College admissions, and graduate school.
Credit Reference: Buying a house, car, loan, employment, business
Renter Reference: To rent a condo, apartment, townhouse, and office space.
Now with the Reference Me Please app you can send any creditor a credit reference invitation through the Reference Me Please app, and store it in a file on the app.
The app has a notification system that will notify the sender once the recipient receives the reference invitation.
The Renters Reference allows for quick references supplied to a prospective landlord. Simply request a reference from your previous landlord, store it on your app, and send it on quickly to the new landlord.
The Reference Me Please! app makes it quick, easy, and convenient to ask, send, receive, and save your references in one place.
Why Reference Me Please
Reference Me Please is extremely beneficial providing accurate information in a timely manner and storing it in a digital format, allowing for a paperless operation, easy to access and really simple to use.
This app makes sure that you are always prepared, with whatever you’re doing whether buying a house, applying to graduate school, or going after your dream job.
With Reference Me Please, keep your network at your fingertips.
How Reference Me Please Improves your references
With Reference Me Please, you can select whom to get your reference from, and vet it in advance of sending it on. It’s always good to know what kind of reference you’re going to get.
Reference Me also provides an opportunity for you to contact referees that wouldn’t usually provide a written reference, such as a creditor you cleared your debt with.
So stay in control of your history with Reference Me Please!
It’s really that simple.
How Reference Me Please! Helps your business
If you’re running a small business or are an independent landlord, Reference Me Please provides a cost effective, and efficient alternative to reference agencies.
As a small business owner you often have to hire temporary staff, or as a landlord rent to lots of tenants over a short period of time. The costs of using an agency can be prohibitive to conducting proper checks. However by using Reference Me Please, you stay in control of your business, keep costs down and get the information you need to proceed.
The Team
Reference Me Please is the brainchild of Maxine Robinson, a small business owner who was confronted with the challenge of hiring casual staff on a regular basis and wanted an efficient cost effective way to stay on top of her reference checking system.
Maxine Robinson, Founder and creator of the Reference Me Please! app
After months of brainstorming and conversations with fellow business owners Maxine came up with Reference Me Please, and the rest as they say is history.
Rushil Sablania is the software developer and has extensive experience in the field of mobile app development.
Photos by:Lalu Patel.
The Concept
The concept is simply to innovate how references are checked, given and stored.
We all live in a digital world and where possible we should use technology to support our most tedious of tasks.
By using the Reference Me Please app, we can reduce the time it takes to send and receive a reference, cut down on administration costs, and completely cut out the middleman. Not to mention the storage facility and always having the right information at your fingertips no matter the situation.
Where are we so far?
The app has been designed and the team are all in place to develop the app and bring it to life.
The reason for this campaign is to raise the funds needed to develop the app, create the website and market Reference Me Please.
Maxine has a team in place poised to spring into action as soon as the funds are secured.
Our Goal
The goal is to raise $25,000 to make Reference Me Please! happen.
Reference Me Please! is a unique product in that it applies to all people living in today’s modern society.
Whether you run a business, are trying to purchase a car, go to college or rent an apartment, Reference Me Please is essential for everyone’s life.
We know that by developing this app and making it available on the Android and iOS platform we will save people a lot of time, trouble and heartache.
Our stretch goals are:
$30,000 – develop the Reference Me Wallet added feature to the app
$40,000 – develop the app for the iOS platform
$50,000 – Launch party to promote, celebrate and launch the Reference Me Please app in style – check out the perks to get invited!
So please support this campaign and make Reference Me Please a reality.
How Can You Support Us?
Reference Me Please! is ready to go live. We want Reference Me Please to be more than just a dream, but we need your help, your support and contributions to make our dream your reality.
We decided to launch our campaign on Kickstarter because we know it’s a great way to reach out to small business owners, disruptors, and mobile app enthusiasts. 
We have lots of ideas for developing Reference Me Please and we know that with your help, we can continue to innovate this simple yet effective product
We need all of you small business owners to get on board and help us out by testing the beta version, sharing our message on social media sites and supporting the campaign with financial donations
We need you, the disruptors, to be ready to download and trial the app when it’s ready, and then tell everyone about it! Collaborate with us to test our products, introduce it to others and help us to become a part of the ever-increasing app movement that enhances lives through digital improvement and industry disruption
So support us by testing, contributing and sharing, Reference Me Please!, and help us to make it a real success.
We would like to Thank every contributor and supporter of Reference Me Please!
Remember to share the project via social media, and for further information or to contact us about your perks email Maxine Robinson on email: maxinerobinson1969@yahoo.com

campaign.story:
Spherical ice has become a growing trend in the last few years because of the rising awareness that it lasts longer and dilutes your drink less. However, the practicality of the process of making them is what keeps then from mainstream use.  Most molds are either expensive, time consuming, or both. 
Our Patent Pending design may be the first to solve all of these problems. By shifting the dimension in one direction and connecting the cavities together, many more ice balls can be made a lot faster. 
Billiard Baller. Makes Eight Billiard Ball sized Ice Balls. 10" x 6"
 Stacking the mold cavities vertically allows you to fill them all at once instead of one at a time, and the two sides of the mold, oriented vertically, are designed to simply seal and snap apart in one motion which allows them to be opened and closed easily. Through this process we've been able to make more ice balls at a time, and do something else that no other spherical mold can do. We can make them in LARGE quantities!
With the vertical stack design, any size ice ball can be made more efficiently, in less time. They also make, in general, a rounder, more quality sphere shaped ball than most competitors we've tested. 
Comparison:
Unnamed Competitior, left, vs Hailstonez Billiard Spheres
Spheres on left were made one at a time with two separate molds. It took four days to make eight Balls.  The Hailstones were made in one day, with one mold. The competitors can make some very round balls as well, but not as consistently.
The Product
  The Hailstonez Billiard Baller. 
The most popular Spherical ice is the "Whiskey Ball", for connoisseurs that like their liquor cold and undiluted. Usually only one Ice ball is necessary, and they last a long time. This one makes eight at a time. The most any other competitor can make can make that we've seen is four. Most molds make one at a time, and because they are predominantly made from silicone, the Ice Balls tend to be irregularly shaped.
Whiskey With single Hailstone
 They are offered at very few establishments because they are still costly and time consuming to make. That is one of the things that we are hoping to change.
The Design
 We have gone through many iterations of the design in order to work out the flaws.  
The first few were not of uniform thickness which via the injection molding process would create bends and divots in the shape due to uneven cooling of the plastic. The tooling of the Aluminum mold would have required two cavities in order to make both sides of the Ice mold.
Male snapping parts on one side. Female on the other
Keep in mind that the above design is for a much smaller Ice Ball. The concept is the same however. Through the design process we eventually figured out how to make a universal part that has both male and female connectors. In other words, both sides of the mold are now COMPLETELY IDENTICAL. This universal part can now snap into another identical part. 
Universal part. Male on one side, Female on other
When your injection mold has to be tooled out of SOLID ALUMINUM, this is a huge advance and has reduced the tooling cost by almost a half. This is what they look like when fit together:
Male snap faces forward on left, and backward on right
Likewise, We have evened out the thickness of the design as uniform as necessary so that it cools evenly in the injection molding process and produces a perfect part every time.
Mold with Heartsink Lid
The mold is sealed with a sealing grove around the edge that prevents water from escaping while it is standing up. In the groove is a Flexible FDA compliant silicone O ring cord that is designed to account for any expansion due to the ice freezing. 
Note. This is not the seal the final product will have. The final seal will be universal as well.
The seal is the most important part of the mold and the part I am most proud of.  The newest versions of the mold are built around the seal and not the other way around.
This Mold will be constructed as well from a BPA Free Polypropylene. It has been Chosen for its FDA compliance, water resistance, stiffness and flexibility, and it's resistance to the cold. 
Discoveries Since Prototyping
Since the testing of the prototypes , I have found three ways to improve the molds:
First, the mold was hard to open because it had too many snapping parts. I have figured out a way to make it with two snaps instead of four. This not only makes for a simpler design, but makes it much easier to open. There are less parts to break as well.
Second, the prototype itself had a tendency to bow in the middle, making it leak over time.  I realized that it needed to be able to seal on the bottom as well, so I have added a tongue and groove mechanism on the bottom that will give a nice even pressure seal along the long axis of the mold. As you can see it is also designed to be universal. 
Tongue on one side, Groove on the other (Photorealistic render)
 When they fit together, it makes mold much more stable, as shown from the bottom in this photorealistic render:
The red tongue is on the left, facing down and the yellow tongue is on the right facing up.
We've found that this works very well as I have tested it in the design of the Billiard Baller prototype.
 I have also learned that they must be made a little larger, as they are a little flimsy in the prototype. 
Third,  The trough needed to be deeper to capture more water. Most people will want to fill the mold from a refrigerator water dispenser, which means that it will likely be held directly over the floor. So I have deepened the trough to make sure that it catches all of the water.
This is the New Look of the Billiard Baller:
Photorealistic Render
It now has ribs to prevent water from seeping between the cavities. It also has a much stronger tongue and groove on the bottom:
 And lastly, the trough is deeper and steeper on the edges to capture more water:
What is the Money For?
The money that I am asking for is for five things.  The prototyping of the of the new model, the construction of the injection mold for mass production, the Initial orders, shipping packaging and any unforeseen expenses. 
Prototyping 5%
3D printing is very fast these days, usually you can have a prototype printed and shipped within two days. The prototype above must be tested. Given the functionality of the device has been proven, the testing is to find if any more improvements can be made. Preparing for all eventualities, I have allocated enough to have two prototypes 3D printed if necessary. If a second must be 3D printed, It would take one more week. Then I will order the Injection Molds built.
Aluminum Thermoplastic Injection Molds 65%
If they pass the testing as expected, then the Injection mold will be ordered which takes about two weeks. The construction of the injection mold is the most costly part of the process. One will have to be built for the Universal part and one to produce the gasket seal. 65% of the funds will go to the construction of the molds. The first samples are sent after the mold is complete and tested. Any modifications (if any) will be made at that point. Modifications won't cost money, just take time. IF the mold needs to be modified, then it might add about three weeks to the date of the initial orders.
Initial Orders 15%
The first batch can be ordered the minute the samples are approved. Delivery usually takes about two weeks and then assembly can begin
Packaging 10%
The packaging chosen for the product will be a see through plastic with graphics printed on them. Plastic was chosen because it will arrive with the graphics already on them. You will be able to see the product clearly and inspect it for defects right through the box. It is also more cost effective than a lot of cardboard packaging that I've found.
Now Designing Graphics for cover
Timeframe:
 You can see some overlap in the stages of development, this is to illustrate the variability in time that it might take for each stage.
Additional Projects
Those of you who have seen my other project know that I have two other models that I would like to produce.  Should this project fund more than I'm asking for, then the additional funds will go to the production of two other molds: 
1. The Marble Baller (as seen above)
 This one I'm most proud of because it demonstrates the efficiency and quantity that these Ice Balls can be made. It's also the most versatile, because these little marbles can fit in any glass and can be used for any drink. It makes Ninety-six at a time.
 And 
2. The Pong Baller.
Makes Ping-Pong ball sized Ice Balls

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are very confident that we have worked out the major issues with the production of the product. However there are a few contingencies that it is prudent to prepare for.

1. There is a possibility that the actual injection molds will have to be retooled. While the retooling process will be relatively cheap , the time lost will be significant. We have prepared for that inevitability by setting our delivery date by July. If the mold needs to be modified, then it should be repaired and ready to be delivered within this time frame. Of course the possibility exists that it will take longer. We will of course make sure to keep everyone involved up to date with the progress so that there are no surprises.

2. The prototype works as expected, but the actual product will be made with a stiffer more consumption friendly plastic. It may behave in a different manner. This is not likely as the material itself was chosen for its density, stiffness and cold resistance, but as with all things untested, it may have some surprises. Most issues can be solved by retooling, or in a drastic case, modifying the injection molds for another material which would take time. The only way it would be expensive is if a completely new mold has to be tooled, which we have prepared for as in step 1.

3. As confident as we are about the material, we have to prepare for the possibility as well that the material might affect the flavor of the ice as some other ice cube trays have. Again not likely, but it would require a retooling of the injection mold for a different material, the same solution as the two aforementioned. 

Aside from the Three risks mentioned above there are always logistical issues that may arise involving shipping, packaging etc. These are mostly time issues so the worst problem is not delivering on time. Again we are preparing for this contingency by setting our date to account for that.

We will pledge to be as honest and transparent as possible and to keep every one of our backers as informed as possible. You are the ones that are going to make this happen, and you deserve to know about the progress of this project!

I Have been advised against showing the actual design until confirmation that the Patent is Pending, but I can demonstrate the concept because It pretty much only applies to my device.
The process of making a "Flawless" Ice Ball, one that is perfectly clear, is actually pretty simple. 
The typical ice ball freezes from the outside in, trapping air bubbles inside. The fact that the ice expands as it moves inward makes for a pressure buildup inside the ball as well.  What you end up with is an Ice ball that has an irregular buildup of pressure inside it that makes it imperfect and cloudy. The result is mostly cosmetic, but the irregular pressure inside the ball also makes it prone to cracking.

Design, promotion, components, scheduling production time from factories are all hurdles when bringing a new product to market. Application development can be a tricky and tedious process. While we have the basics down there is still work to be done.
